conclusion: Analyze forces on the coil in the magnetic field to find magnetic induction intensity B.
Current balance with rectangular coil in magnetic field, weights on balance pans.
Magnetic force on coil is F = nBIL, acting on horizontal sides.
Force on left side is upwards, right side is downwards, net force is zero initially.
Reversing current reverses force direction on each side of the coil.
To balance, add weight with mass m to left pan, gravitational force is mg.
Net magnetic force equals gravitational force of added mass.
Total magnetic force when current is reversed is 2nBIL.
Gravitational force mg balances magnetic force 2nBIL.
